metadata.name: Coop HUD *WIP*
metadata.description:
[h1]Coop HUD - proper HUD for coop[/h1] Mod renders player items/trinkets/stats and more for up to 4 coop players. [h3]Recently due performance issues mod has been hidden in workshop and rewritten. It is less laggy and buggy right now. Check what is already working in description[/h3]
[h3] [b] MOD IS STILL DEVELOPED PLEASE SUBMIT ANY WEIR BEHAVIOUR ( weird positions/ console errors/ log files) in Bugs topic[/b] [/h3] [h2] What new:[/h2] [list] [*] Forgotten - Lost - full support [*] Tainted ??? support - show spells and Hold up to 4 players [*] Tainted Izaak support - up to 4 players [*] Can now turn off my stuff page if annoying [/list] [h2] What this mod do[/h2] [list] [*] Renders proper HUD for coop/multiplayer up to 4 players [*] Colorful players and HUD info - can turn off [*] Shows pockets/pills/card names [*] Bethany charges/ colored charge bar [*] Jacob/Essau: full support for up to 4 Jacob/Essau pairs on screen: [list] [*] Shows full and clear Jacob Essau active items/trinkets/pockets on screen [*] Shows Essau stats: [list] [*] When more than 2 players: on drop button - switched with main [*] With less then 2 players: under main character stats [/list] [/list] [*] Vanilla like prompts (using cards/ pills/ active items/ transformations ) with color of player [*] Stats - just like vanilla FoundHUD stat display: [list] [*] Show stats up to 4 players [*] Highlight on map button [*] Stats colors - can turn on/off [*] Hide stats on battle - can turn on/off [*] Angel/Devil/Planetarium chances - with customizable positions [/list] [*] ExtraHUD - hold map button to trigger my stuff page: [list] [*] Shows collected passive collectibles and gulped trinkets [*] Colorful page color to recognize from other players [*] Scalable item sprites according to sum of collected items [*] Supports up to 136 collected item - earliest collected items won't be show [/list] [/list] [h2] Planned features/ not implemented yet[/h2] [list] [*] Jacob and Essau - show Essau passive items [*] Gideon/Greed Wave Counter [*] Destination icons [*] Small HUD - customizable positions [*] Tainted Maggy - pulsing hearts animation [*] Tainted Cain - bag of crafting [*] Bag of crafting for other players [/list] [h2] What this mod lack of[/h2] [list] [*] For menu options use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Mod Config Menu - Continued[/url] [*] Boss bars – I won’t be messing with. I suggest using[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2635267643] [Rep] Enhanced Boss Bars [/url] from[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge[/url] My mod should override Boss bars settings in case bar covers coopHUD check options. If boss bar covers items change it padding in settings. [*] Minimap – Same as boss bars – Use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635]MiniMAPI[/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge[/url] My mod should override MiniMAPI settings. Options should be: General -> Display on No HUD seed - On Map (1) - > Show map effect icons - Off [/list] [h2]Issues/ not working/missing[/h2] [list] [*] Modded cards/pills support [*] Modded characters [*] Jar of Wisp - cannot get Jar of Wisps charge from API, charge counted manual. No support for multiple Jar of Wisp on one run - wont show proper indicator [*] Urn of soul - cannot get souls from game API, only opened/closed sprite indicator [/list] [h2] Mods Compatibility[/h2] [list] [*] It's compatible with modded trinkets and items [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2635267643] [Rep] Enhanced Boss Bars [/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635] MiniMAPI[/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872] [AB+|Rep] External item descriptions[/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900]Wofsauge[/url] For right now you must set EID position manually [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2376005362] Encyclopedia - An In-Game Wiki[/url]from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/AgentCucco/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] AgentCucco[/url] [/list] [h2] Thanks to![/h2] [list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge[/url] - for TBoI API and his mods which helped in developing this mod [/list]
